commit.message: implement createFilterSearch in basic intermediate blueprints
extend SimpleBlueprint: add createFilterSearch that tags iterator
test createFilterSearch in basic intermediate blueprints

nodes.bodyText: According to the RE2 docs, set_dot_nl(bool) has the behavior "dot matches everything including new line". Maybe we should call this DotMatchesNewline instead to be explicit that this does not trigger any changes to how anchors work etc? MultiLine might imply some different semantics than what is currently in place.
all EXPECT macros also return whether the check was successful, so the above if could check the EXPECT_TRUE result instead.
Consider snake_case for consistency (e.g. child_strict is used further down).
